job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>Machine Learning Engineer - Aliso Viejo, CA</strong></p><p><strong>AWM Smart Shelf </strong>is reinventing retail and looking for smart, talented people to work on building exciting applications. The initial focus of this position is working on AWM Frictionless which is a cashierless-shopping solution for shoppers to be able to grab what they want from a store and simply walk out.</p><p><br></p><p>Our solution uses real-time computer vision and deep learning to determine what shoppers take. We're looking for a Machine Learning Engineer to run with the selection, training, and evaluation of our item and action recognition models.</p><p><br></p><p>If your ML background is not in image processing, but something like NLP or finance, you may still be a great fit! We’re looking for nimble, practical problem solvers and we value a diversity of perspectives.</p><p><br></p><p>We tinker, experiment, and hack on many different approaches and love people who aren't afraid to jump around. A successful Machine Learning Engineer will rapidly iterate – failing fast to identify the most promising paths forward.</p><p><br></p><p>If this sounds like fun, we'd love to hear from you!</p><p><br></p><p><strong>THE JOB</strong></p><ul><li>Implement machine learning models for item classification and action recognition</li><li>Ability to evaluate model performance and monitor the training process</li><li>Adapt existing models to better handle problems specific to our domain</li><li>Integrate models into our production pipeline for real-time processing</li><li>Test cutting-edge models on our custom datasets</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>WHO YOU ARE</strong></p><ul><li>Someone who executes – a focus on action and results - can self-manage to timelines and deliver</li><li>Practical coding knowledge (Python preferred) to quickly iterate on training and testing models</li><li>Understanding of CNNs and the tradeoffs of different architectures</li><li>Knowledge of best practices in machine learning</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>NICE TO HAVE</strong> (but not mandatory)</p><ul><li>Experience with video data</li><li>Experience with distributive training in the cloud</li><li>Experience with sequence modeling</li><li>Relevant education in an undergraduate or graduate program</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>WHAT WE OFFER</strong></p><ul><li>A dynamic environment where you can make an impact using the latest technologies</li><li>Paid vacation and sick time</li><li>Health benefits</li><li>Opportunity for growth</li><li>401k plan</li><li>Potential for employee stock option plan participation</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>**PLEASE APPLY TO BE CONSIDERED**</strong></p>
